name: Denuke
description:
WWIII is happening and someone had launched a nuke!!!

As an angel, you must delay nuclear fission as long as possible to extend humans' lifetime!

Click and drag to move the little angle around preventing the triggering particles from starting the nuclear fission! Be aware of different types of motions and accelerations that would catch you off guard!

Music: https://maou.audio/

Sprites: https://www.irasutoya.com/
